title: School Library Practicum Education: Professional Development through Field Training and Metacognitive Reflection

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: An online asynchronous self-directed practical training program for working professionals in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can successfully perform three or more practical tasks (e.g., material classification, reading program operation, user education) in school library settings.
Learners can record and present at least two issues and improvement plans identified during practical training through weekly metacognitive reflection journals.
Learners revise practical deliverables at least once based on peer feedback and submit the final project.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
